Shadowheart also has a rivalry with Lae'zel, so going against Lae'zel and supporting Shadowheart whenever the choice presents itself will also raise her approval of you. However, this obviously goes against Lae'zels approval as well so players will have to be wary of that. Being successful with Persuasion, Deception, Religion, and Insight checks will grant you her approval as well as long as she's in your current party.
